Skimming: A way of reading in a fast manner so as to grasp the main points.
Scanning: Looking quickly and carefully at the material so as to locate something.

Skimming: Reading out the maximum content in minimum time.
To take a birds-eye view of the text.
Scanning: To spot and cast specific facts.

Skimming: The reader is not familiar with the text.
Scanning: The reader knows what he is searching for.
